name: Pickup Basketball VR
description:
Pickup Basketball VR is a multiplayer VR game that lets up to 4 players play in various game modes including 1v1, 2v2, Horse and 3-point contest. Pickup Basketball VR allows players to compete online with or against friends and players from across the world.

This basketball game is an immersive sports gaming experience like never-before utilizing the technology of VR.

Pickup Basketball VR utilizes unique technology in allowing for a never-before experienced simulation of basketball featuring:

- Realistic controls that involve dribbling, shooting, passing that brings you the feel of a true basketball game

- Multiplayer mode where you can play other players online and test your skills in full play pick up games

- Different court options including playground, gym, skyrise and more.

- Customize your player avatar with a variety of options including face, skin tone, hair, jersey and other accessories
